backend/main.mo: Motoko actor implementing complaint submission, storage, access control, lifecycle tracking, and priority scoring.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing files and components changed for removing the term SLA from UI text.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries of all frontend files for reference in build planning.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind-based global styles defining OKLCH color variables for light and dark themes.
frontend/index.html: Base HTML entry file mounting the app and loading main.tsx.
frontend/README.md: Setup guide describing prerequisites and installation steps for the frontend project.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app configuring routes, theme provider, auth state, and layout.
frontend/src/components/auth/LoginButton: Login/logout button component integrating Internet Identity auth.
frontend/src/components/auth/ProfileSetu: Inactive modal for future user profile setup with basic form UI.
frontend/src/components/complaints/Befor: Component displaying before/after complaint photos with status indicators.
frontend/src/components/complaints/Compl: Card showing complaint metadata including priority, deadlines, dates, and reporter info.
frontend/src/components/complaints/Escal: Badge showing escalation status with relative timestamp.
frontend/src/components/complaints/Photo: Image uploader with preview, validation, and remove functionality that returns the selected file to a parent callback.
frontend/src/components/complaints/Prior: Displays a priority badge with icon and color based on urgency level.
frontend/src/components/complaints/SlaBa: Shows SLA status as overdue or time remaining, based on due date and complaint status.
frontend/src/components/feedback/Resolut: Form for confirming resolution, rating service, adding comments, and submitting feedback to the backend.
frontend/src/components/layout/AppLayout: Main app layout with header, navigation links, mobile drawer, and footer, adapting links based on auth and admin status.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages the backend actor based on Internet Identity, refreshing dependent queries when the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides authentication context using Internet Identity with login, logout, and identity persistence.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: React-query hooks for fetching and mutating complaint data, including submission, status updates, and admin checks.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind layers and custom CSS variables for light and dark themes with a civic‑focused color palette.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with React Query and Internet Identity provider, then renders the root App component.
frontend/src/pages/citizen/MyReportsPage: Shows a user’s submitted complaints with loading, empty‑state, and detailed list views using badges and status indicators.
frontend/src/pages/citizen/SubmitComplai: Provides a form for authenticated users to submit new complaints with category, location, description, and photo upload.
frontend/src/pages/complaints/ComplaintD: Displays full complaint details, including photos and admin actions, with support for status updates and after‑photo upload.
frontend/src/pages/DocsPage.tsx: Renders a documentation page showing prerequisites and step‑by‑step setup instructions for the project.
frontend/src/pages/LandingPage.tsx: Displays the marketing landing page with hero content, feature steps, and links to start reporting or view docs.
frontend/src/pages/official/HigherOffici: Shows escalated complaints to higher officials, gating access by admin role and listing complaint cards with priority and escalation info.
frontend/src/pages/official/OfficialDash: Renders the official dashboard with tabbed views for open and in‑progress complaints, including priority, deadline badges, and admin-gated access.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides helpers for reading, storing, and clearing URL parameters with sessionStorage fallback and hash‑based routing support.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration defining theme extensions, color tokens, typography, queries, animations, and plugin setup.
project_state.json: Project metadata describing Civic Lens features, requirements, architecture notes, and current build state.
